document.full_text: tyler seguin, boston's highly regarded rookie center, scored two goals and assisted on two others in a 6-5 victory over the tampa bay lightning.
document.title: bruins 6, lightning 5: seguin's breakout night helps bruins tie series
lines_and_colors: tyler seguin, boston's highly regarded rookie center, scored two goals and assisted on two others in a 6-5 victory over the tampa bay lightning.
